getDryFilter

Filter getDryFilter()
Returns:
The {#link Filter dry filter} that is set.
See Also:
AudioSource#setDryFilter(com.jme3.audio.Filter)

getAudioData

AudioData getAudioData()
Returns:
The AudioData set previously with AudioSource#setAudioData(com.jme3.audio.AudioData, com.jme3.audio.AudioKey) or any of the constructors that initialize the audio data.

setStatus

void setStatus(AudioSource.Status status)
Do not use.

getStatus

AudioSource.Status getStatus()
Returns:
The AudioSource.Status of the audio source. The status will be changed when either the AudioSource#play() or AudioSource#stop() methods are called.

isLooping

boolean isLooping()
Returns:
True if the audio will keep looping after it is done playing, otherwise, false.
See Also:
AudioSource#setLooping(boolean)

getPitch

float getPitch()
Returns:
The pitch of the audio, also the speed of playback.
See Also:
AudioSource#setPitch(float)

getVolume

float getVolume()
Returns:
The volume of this audio source.
See Also:
AudioSource#setVolume(float)

getTimeOffset

float getTimeOffset()
Returns:
the time offset in the sound sample when to start playing.

getPosition

Vector3f getPosition()
Returns:
The velocity of the audio source.
See Also:

The velocity of the audio source.

isReverbEnabled

boolean isReverbEnabled()
Returns:
True if reverb is enabled, otherwise false.
See Also:
AudioSource#setReverbEnabled(boolean)

getReverbFilter

Filter getReverbFilter()
Returns:
Filter for the reverberations of this audio source.
See Also:
AudioSource#setReverbFilter(com.jme3.audio.Filter)

getMaxDistance

float getMaxDistance()
Returns:
Max distance for this audio source.
See Also:
AudioSource#setMaxDistance(float)

getRefDistance

float getRefDistance()
Returns:
The reference playing distance for the audio source.
See Also:
AudioSource#setRefDistance(float)

isDirectional

boolean isDirectional()
Returns:
True if the audio source is directional
See Also:
AudioSource#setDirectional(boolean)

Returns:
The directional audio source, cone inner angle.
